        public boolean accept(Annotation annotation)
               throws ToolException
        Description copied from interface: MaraAnnotationHandler
        Can this handler handle this annotation?
        Parameters:
        annotation - the annotation under consideration
        Returns:
        true if acceptable, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ToolException - if the process encounters an exception of any kind

        Process the annotation.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the annotation to apply to the configuration
        job - the job under configuration
        target - object annotation is applied to (class, field, or method)

        ToolException - if the process encounters an exception of any kind

      • convertScanToString

        protected String convertScanToString(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Scan scan)
                              throws IOException
        COPIED from TableMapReduceUtil since it's not visible in that class. Makes this class somewhat brittle, but if we call the static method directly we risk overwriting the mapper class.
        Parameters:
        scan - the scan to convert
        Returns:
        string-representation of the scan
        Throws:
        IOException - if encoding to base64 bytes fails
